TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit RequiredRuntimeAttribute extends System.Attribute
Public NotInheritable Class RequiredRuntimeAttribute Inherits Attribute
public ref class RequiredRuntimeAttribute sealed : Attribute

summary.span: 定義中繼資料 (Metadata) 屬性 (Attribute)，供工作作者用來識別此工作是否需要 CLR 執行階段的特定版本。

span.span: Defines the metadata attribute that task authors use to identify whether the task requires a specific version of the CLR runtime.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 任務標示為具有表示它具有更嚴格的執行階段需求比一般的工作。A task marked with the indicates that it has a stricter runtime requirement than a regular task. 它會警示 MSBuild，它可能需要啟動工作的不同程序，如果目前的 CLR 執行階段版本不符合所需的版本。It alerts MSBuild that it may need to start a separate process for the task if the current CLR runtime version does not match the required version. > [!NOTE] > 這個屬性是目前無法運作，因為只有一個版本 (2.0) 的 clr 能夠執行[!INCLUDE[vstecmsbuild](~/includes/vstecmsbuild-md.md)]2.0 或 3.5 版。This attribute is currently non-functional because only one version of the CLR (2.0) is capable of running either [!INCLUDE[vstecmsbuild](~/includes/vstecmsbuild-md.md)] version 2.0 or 3.5. 如需使用屬性的詳細資訊，請參閱[使用屬性擴充中繼資料](~/docs/standard/attributes/index.md)。For more information about using attributes, see [Extending Metadata Using Attributes](~/docs/standard/attributes/index.md).

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string runtimeVersion) cil managed

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

param.name: runtimeVersion
param.span: 需要的 CLR 執行階段版本前面必須加上 "v"，例如 "v2.0"。

span.span: The version of the CLR runtime required prefaced with a "v," such as "v2.0."

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property RuntimeVersion As String
public: property System::String ^ RuntimeVersion { System::String ^ get(); };

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 取得用來建構屬性的 CLR 執行階段版本，例如 "v2.0"。

span.span: Gets the CLR runtime version the attribute was constructed with, such as "v2.0."

value.span: 字串，其中包含需要的 CLR 執行階段版本。

span.span: A string containing the CLR runtime version required.
